attributes.action: dissolve Parliament to allow election of more trustworthy MPs for the people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Latest events have shown quite appauling behaviour by so many MPs. We must dissolve parliament in light of the complete lack of faith and trust of the current selection of MPs and to put the vote back to the people to decide who should represent them in Government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
